instructions.command_all:
RUN addgroup -g ${SERVICE_GID} ${SERVICE_GROUP} && \
	adduser -g "${SERVICE_NAME} user" -D -H -G ${SERVICE_GROUP} -s /sbin/nologin -u ${SERVICE_UID} ${SERVICE_USER} && \
	apk add --update libcap

change_instruction.all:
RUN addgroup -g ${SERVICE_GID} ${SERVICE_GROUP} && \
	adduser -g "${SERVICE_NAME} user" -D -H -G ${SERVICE_GROUP} -s /sbin/nologin -u ${SERVICE_UID} ${SERVICE_USER} && \
	apk add --update libcap
